turn.1: What happened at the 1992 Epsom Derby?
turn.2: 1992 Epsom Derby The 1992 Epsom Derby was a horse race which took place at Epsom Downs on Wednesday 3 June 1992.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It was the 213th running of the Derby, and it was won by Dr Devious.
turn.6: The winner was ridden by John Reid and trained by Peter Chapple-Hyam.
turn.8: The pre-race favourite Rodrigo de Triano finished ninth.
